content: now on needle 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches from end of needle 1 k2tog k1 continue in this way decreasing at beginning and end of needle 1 every other round and working pattern on needle 2 until 27 stitches remain on needle 1 continue foot of sock knit in pattern across needle 2 and in plain stockingette across needle 1 chart - - - m m / \ m m - - - 2 - - - - - - 1 key to symbols knit all blank spaces - purl \ slip slip knit / knit two together m m make one by knitting into front and back of the stitch note that this occupies two spaces on the chart copyright 2007 kirsten kapur www throughtheloops typepad com
